text:
Yeah I thought why not suggest something wild. Meant a 360 degree camera rather than 3D.

But great you're taking questions and showing the slides alongside the view. :film_projector: :applause:
Is there an RSVP option for online attendees?
Nope, We'll update the landing page when we have more info about the streaming of the event. <@U7SL518D6>

Great question Dana.

For right now we don’t have a form for that - mostly to prevent confusing physical attendees. We also don’t need to track online attendees since we can have a crazy amount of them. But I do see the desire for getting like a notification for when the livestream starts.
indeed! :slightly_smiling_face: I'll just keep my ears perked

As requested <@UDFTHC6PK> while we dont have a signup, we did just create a YT channel for it all, you can subscribe to the channel here: <https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCESDCHGKH8VjO9bIwERTSkQ?sub_confirmation=1>

(we are working on the branding for the channel :wink: )
